item.title: AC4: Algebraic Computation Checker for Circuit Constraints in ZKPs
item.description:
Summary

  • Introduces AC4, a tool that encodes arithmetic circuit constraints from zk-SNARK-style circuits into polynomial equation systems and solves them over finite fields to detect underconstrained and overconstrained bugs.
  • Classifies verification results more finely (distinguishing types of constraint failures) to improve expressiveness of circuit checking.
  • Reports experimental improvements: ~29% higher solved rate vs Picus and CIVER and modest gains over halo2-analyzer; solving-time improvements within the solvable range.
  • Aims to prevent bugs that could cause a verifier to accept bogus witnesses or reject valid onesâ€”issues that can compromise correctness of ZKP-based blockchain applications.
